website_summaries.verdict: Tablets can be difficult to give to stubborn dogs, but on the plus side, these don’t need refrigeration.
pros: Tablets don’t need refrigeration, a plus for many owners
Works well at easing dog’s itching, shedding, and arthritis
cons: Some dogs refuse to take the tablets
Doesn’t work at all for some dogs, and a few owners report adverse effects like constipation

customer_reviews.title: No more skin allergy, hot spots, itchy, and danddruf
customer_reviews.text: Thanks God I found this...I was about to put my dog to sleep, I tried many vets for his sjom condition, they jist give medicine a but he would get sick again after finishing the medicine, we spend so much money in drs, that now we can't anymore, rocky is my life my love.for him is uncomditional, but since I started it giving his this product his skin allergy ,hot spots, are definitly.going away, his fur is growing back, he seems very happy...the big difference and the before and after is very big...I am so happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BOOMER THANKS YOU
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE GONE THROUGH ONE OF THESE AND CAN REALLY TELL THE DIFFERENCE. IT'S SO NICE NOT HAVING ANY REFRIGERATION OR SMELLY OIL TO CLEAN UP. DOG LOVE THEM (THINKS THERE TREATS). COAT LOOKS GREAT EYES SEEM CLEARER. BOOMER HIGHLY RECCOMENDS THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: S. WRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this tablet flavor
customer_reviews.text: Updated:. My black lab has dandruff and after about a week of 2 of these tablets a day; I can already tell a positive difference in his coat. So far, I'm pleased with the tablets. ___________________________________________ So far, my dogs will take this tablet without smearing it in peanut butter. Surprisingly one of my Labradors is picky and he won't eat many things. He gobbles this up. I do not know if it is helping yet; but, we have just started. So, I'll try to update review once I figure out if it is helping the dandruff.
customer_reviews.author: HaveDogsLuv2Hike

customer_reviews.title: I have a sweet boy that I rescued a year ago
customer_reviews.text: I have a sweet boy that I rescued a year ago. He is a beautiful dog and I think that the Amazing Nutritional Omega-3 Chews are the reason his coat is so shiny and gorgeous. He scratched himself to pieces before I found these chews on Amazon. He LOVES them...our morning ritual is catching two in mid-air after his walk. They are a definite and forever part of my dog's healthy diet. They deserve the name "Amazing"...just ask Gus!
customer_reviews.author: Lauraki

customer_reviews.title: Your dog says "Mom! Get this for me!"
customer_reviews.text: In the 4 months we've been giving this to our 14 pound schnoodle, her coat has lost its coarseness and gotten very silky. She doesn't scratch nearly as much, and no longer licks at her feet as if they're itchy. We've given her only 1 tablet a day because she's a small dog. If you have a bigger dog, the 3 tabs suggested may be necessary - but there's nothing wrong with playing around with the dosage till you see results. We've used other brands, but I'm reordering this one because I've definitely seen the difference it's made. I recommend it 100%.
customer_reviews.author: FatRedhead

customer_reviews.title: My dog had a bad case of the itches that would cause him to ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a bad case of the itches that would cause him to bleed and have where he had dug to the skin. But after about a week of being on these vitamins he has dramatically stopped itching and can enjoy himself rather than trying to scratch in between everything. My only issue is that you can fly through a bottle with a larger breed dog, I have a 100 lbs yellow lab that requires a couple of tablets. But on that same note, I can not in anyway say that it isn't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for my dog's scratching
customer_reviews.text: My Morkie, Chewie, used to get really bad spots all over from scratching himself. The spots looked like bruises and some of them would even scab over because he was chewing and scratching so much. I tried less baths, more baths, powders, all kinds of things. I found out from my vet that he might have allergies or dry skin and to try some kind of fish oil for him. I've been using these for two years now and he has no more dry spots, and he doesn't scratch or chew like he used to. I just give him one tablet every night. Chewie loves the taste of them too, he thinks that they are treats!
customer_reviews.author: Tbucket

customer_reviews.title: Great for my senior dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I will purchase these Amazing Nutritionals Omega-3 Fish Oil tablets again. My dogs love the taste, so it's very easy to give them 3 tabs per day. My 13 year old chocolate lab has very sensitive skin. Her coat was dull and she was losing hair. We feed her quality food but that wasn't enough. She's been taking these for a month now and her coat has a shine to it once again and her hair is growing back. She has a bounce in her gait now...so I think she feels better too!
customer_reviews.author: luv2shoponline

customer_reviews.title: Awful Smelling
customer_reviews.text: My dog has dandruff and I've been attempting to find a solution. I know fish oil should help and after looking at the reviews for this product I bought some. Upon opening the bottle, I couldn't get over how bad the tablets smelled. It's awful, and not in a food way. I honestly don't even know what to compare the smell to. My dog won't touch them, I even broke them up and put them in her food and she just ate around them. I can't even blame her, they smell that bad. I don't know if I got a bad batch or if this is normal.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Sousa

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: I have a mutt who has food allergies. Constant licking at his paws and constant dandruff. Weve tried everything even moving him to grain free everything. Started these about 3 weeks ago. He is 100 pds. I give him 2 or 3. He eats them like a treat. I started noticing a difference within the first week. Now, his coat is shiny and healthy looking with minimal dandruff. I will definetly buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Loisel

customer_reviews.title: they gobbled them up with no problem and appeared to enjoy the taste
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my three dogs. If you have one dog, the quantity is okay. If you have three? Not so much with the amount of tablets you have to use per day. There was not a noticeable difference when my dogs were on it, so I switched to a different Omega 3 company for my dogs. As for whether or not my dogs would eat it: they gobbled them up with no problem and appeared to enjoy the taste. Packaging was good and arrived without anything wrong with the container and had clear instructions on the bottle. I'm sure it works great for many dogs...just not for my fur babies.
customer_reviews.author: HobbsGal

customer_reviews.title: I am SO glad to have found this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased it to help get her shedding under control as well as the other benefits of the product. I am happy to announce that IT HAS WORKED!! Beautifully! I am so happy, I was loosing my mind because all the hair she was shedding. I had to vacuum twice a day. Now it's back to the normal every four-five days of vacuuming. After having given her four tablets a day for two weeks then dropped down to three (I noticed her breath was starting to stink) and it has helped TREMENDOUSLY! I actually saw a difference within the later part of the first two weeks. I am so happy! Great product and totally great customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check as soon as they arrive
customer_reviews.text: Normally I love this product but be aware and check them as soon as they arrive, we have subscribe and save to deliver them monthly for our 3 large dogs and they work great but the last two shipments have been bad or tampered with. Two had the seals broken and smelled rancid, one had no seal at all, and one had the seal not stuck at all and a lot of moisture (condensation maybe?) inside the bottle and smelled weird. Unfortunately since we order a month ahead we’re outside of our return period but lesson learned on these to carefully check them when they arrive. They all had their plastic seals in tact.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron O'Hare

customer_reviews.title: Well that didn't go as well as I had hoped  :(
customer_reviews.text: I only gave my GSD/Mal 1 tablet and about an hour later she had horrible diarrhea, waited a couple days and again gave her only 1 tablet and she had the same reaction. Something in these tablets don't agree with her stomach :( Sucks as I had ordered 2 bottles because of the great reviews and am now stuck with them. Will go back to the regular fish oil tabs wrapped in cream cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Twisted Stitches

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, will be a staple in my dogs diet
customer_reviews.text: So we finished the first bottle we bought and by the end of the bottle he smelled great again. His musty, yeasty smell was completely gone. The true test as to whether or not it was the omega 3’s was when we ran low and I cut him back to 2/3 a day. His smell slowly started coming back and so I’ve reordered. It’s an amazing product and this will be a staple in my doggy pantry. Thank you for your dedication to our animals and to creating such an effective product.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: A Little Miracle *treat*
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe the difference in my McNab. His coat is gorgeous, he has almost completely stopped itching and that had gotten so bad he was taking antibiotics because his belly had gotten infected but now, he's sleeping instead of chewing on himself and he's like a different dog, he's back to his old self and playing again. This is a miracle and he loves the taste of his "treats" so taking them is not a problem. I will keep giving him his treats for the rest of his life.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for 3 weeks now. Vallee (our 5 mo old Pitbull/Mastiff) gets at least 2 baths/wk because of daycare days. Her fur has gotten more shiny, and I've noticed much less flacking! All around I think this product is great for her fur, brain development, and joints. She's a very 'top heavy' breed, growing pup with growing pains. Shes a slightly picky eater and liked the taste of these right away. She weighs 30 lbs now and I give her 2 tablets every night before bed. I've seen results with this product and would highly recommend!!:)
customer_reviews.author: Mamabb18Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Palatable and it works
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think it would help my dogs' coats out, because they already had wonderful coats due too expensive food. Spoiled brats. But their coats became softer and fuller. My female, who will unwrap food and spit pills out, actually ate this without coersion. My brother, who has the brother from the same litter, commented on their coats and bought some for his dogs also. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brieann Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for picky eaters!
customer_reviews.text: My dog had really dry, flaky skin for almost an entire year. Once he started getting hair loss around his eyes, I decided I needed to try supplements. I tried many different products including fish oils that you add to their food, powder supplements, and food for sensitive skin, but nothing seemed to work; he either did not like the supplement or it did nothing for him. I tried these chewable tablets because they were highly rated and they were also flavored to appeal to picky eaters. Now, more than 4 months later, his dry skin is no longer flaring up and his hair has grown back! Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my Kobe :-(
customer_reviews.text: My dog refused to eat these. I tried to put them in his food but he still was able to spit them back out. I broke them into small pieces and he ate them. Within hours he vomited. I went a few days before trying again to make sure it wasn't a fluke, but again he vomited within a couple hours. Must have an allergy to fish or something else in these. What a shame as I was hopeful. I wouldn't blame it on the company or product unless others have the same problem, but the only way to know that is to submit reviews such as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works the way it's supposed to, good stuff for our kids (dogs)
customer_reviews.text: We use a lot of products to improve our dogs health, this is one of them. Our kids deserve the best and Omega 3 really works. We have a purebred Carolina dog, his hair is short, but it was shedding like crazy. After doing a bit of research we decided to give this product a try. Guess what, the hair situation is improving, we're not vacuuming up handfuls of it now. I think by the time we finish this bottle the shedding will be under control. Then it will be time to buy another! Thanks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: darceebysea

customer_reviews.title: Made a huge difference in my dog's coat
customer_reviews.text: She's not a big fan of eating them plain. I just add a little cream cheese and she gobbles them up. She weighs about 60 pounds and I give her 2 in the morning and 2 in the evening. I wasn't sure they were doing anything so we stopped for a time. OMG! She started shedding like crazy! For her, this really makes her shed a lot less! I don't know about pain relief but she looks much healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Sue

customer_reviews.title: I got this more for her skin and coat because she has very sensitive skin but so far it's been looking pretty good and i'm very
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a 8 year old pekingese. I honestly haven't been giving these to her for that long (only a week), but I can already see her coat shining and looking very healthy. As far as brain health, it's too soon to tell. She wasn't slow or anything before but I'm sure this will improve but I can give an update on that later. I got this more for her skin and coat because she has very sensitive skin but so far it's been looking pretty good and i'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: My dog thanks you!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave reviews on Amazon, but my dog really wanted me to do it. He couldn't be happier with them. He has seasonal allergies and his skin itches like crazy. He usually itches so much that he gets bald spots no matter how many times he takes a bath. Last year he really suffered, but not this year. When he started scratching himself, I found this product on Amazon and decided to try it. Within 3 days, he almost stopped scratching completely. No bald spots and he couldn't be happier! If you have dogs with summer allergies, my dog, Fu Dawg, and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: HeyJanet

customer_reviews.title: Shiny Coat
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 9 years old, a black Lab, and no matter how hard I try, I can not fool her by putting fish oil in her food. Her coat was getting dull and clumps of dry fur were falling out . She has been using these for a year now and what an amazing turn about. Shiny fur, actually glistens in the summer sun. I do brush her often which helps. We give her these every morning and she thinks they are are treats.
customer_reviews.author: Deezie

customer_reviews.title: They work, but not tasty to my dog...
customer_reviews.text: I have a Pom with terrible skin and fur problems. Alopecia x. And food allergies, he got sores all over his body. Even after eliminating food allergens (no more chicken or beef), he still had sores. The vet told me to give him omega every day. It took a while to take effect - maybe a month - but his skin is good now. Also, not dry like it used to be. Only problem, he doesn't like eating them so I have to wrap them in cheese. Otherwise I'd say I'd stick with them forever. (Other pills, like vitamins, he does eat. Just not this omega pill.)
customer_reviews.author: fun times mama

customer_reviews.title: Smells strongly of fish
customer_reviews.text: The advertising sold me on the "Bacon & Liver Flavored!" and so I thought my dog would eat them. You see, my dog doesn't like fish. However, as soon as I opened the jar, I got a strong whiff of fish! I then smelled the insides of bottle again and couldn't detect any bacon or liver smell...just fish! So, my dog hasn't eaten any! False advertising! I'm certainly not going to taste them to see if somehow through the strong fishy smell they somehow taste like bacon and liver.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia H

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Almost instant results
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving my mini poodle one tablet daily for about two weeks now and I have seen major improvement with her dry skin! My dog has struggled with chronic dry skin for about a year now and is always licking. The licking eventually leads to severe irritation which leaves us trying to remedy the dryness and the wounds. I cannot believe the drastic change! We have not had to cone her since she began the tablets! Our poodle is about 10lbs. I was so skeptical about purchasing, but I can assure anyone that this was a great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this product. Unfortunately, my 12 y.o. Dog (chocolate lab) had a bad reaction to this item. Only gave her a quarter of a tablet. Discussed with my vet. We'll try a different product. Every animal is unique, so I am not writing this to dissuade your purchase. Just giving you our feedback. Not sure if we will return or toss. Thank you for the opportunity to share.
customer_reviews.author: deniska

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product and Great Company!
customer_reviews.text: This worked super well on my French Bulldog who is 6. Her hair is cream colored and has grown in thicker than ever before. I also got this for my 10 year old English Bulldog. I'm not sure it's helped as much, but he's older and his coat has been in poor shape for a couple of years, even with the best food, etc. I just bought another bottle. This company offered a free amazon gift card for the $21.97 purchase price and I just used that!! Great company, great customer service (mostly automated)...but love their replies and will continue to use this product. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great - pup loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our vet recommended that we add a fish oil supplement to our 1.5 year old golden retriever’s diet to help regulate some of the skin irritation he has had from environmental allergies. He has been taking this supplement for about 6 months and has had tremendous success! He weighs 70lbs - we give him one chew with breakfast and one with dinner. Technically we could give him a higher dose per the bottle, but this dosage seems to work perfect for him. His skin looks great and his coat is gorgeous. He loves taking his vitamin and begs/whines if we forget to give it to him!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Mueller

customer_reviews.title: So far so good :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought these vitamins for my two small pups, an 8 month old and a 3 month old, to help boost their immune systems and make them healthier, happier pups. My 3 month old is currently struggling with Mange that she had when we adopted her from the shelter. Its too soon to tell if its helping, but hopefully within a few weeks we start seeing her on the road to recovery with her medication, medicated shampoo baths and these Omega 3 chews! So far the pups both LOVE the taste of these and think they're getting special treats!
customer_reviews.author: Steph918Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great product - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My dogs gets one tablet twice a day, one with each meal. Their fur coats have become so soft and shiny! The one who used to scratch and have flaky skin doesn't anymore and he sleeps more soundly during the night. I'm happy with the results of this product and also happy with the clean ingredients. My vet said that the fish oil gel tablets pretty much get passed right through before absorption so I was happy to find this chewable product.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferStLouis

customer_reviews.title: Scratching Relief!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dog to help his itchy skin. He was getting dry hot spots and was really scratching. At first I thought he had fleas but never found one on him. I had my doubts about this stuff at first, but I’ve been giving them to him for about a month and a half, and I do believe it’s working. The dry spots are disappearing and he’s not scratching as much.It’s hard to be patient when your pet has problems but it’s part of the cure. I plan on giving Omega to him to help keep him feeling young.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for my dog’s skin and fur!
customer_reviews.text: My dog was having terrible dandruff and itchy skin so on the guidance of the vet we tried fish oil. I chose this brand because it claimed to be less messy than other liquid options and could be mixed in with my do’s Food. This is the second bottle I’ve purcjased because it’s worked wonders! The dandruff went away within a week and has not returned, he’s not itchy anymore and his coat is so incredibly shiny! Archie (my dog) doesn’t notice the fish oil tablets in his food and will even eat them plain. I give him on tablet a day and would highly recommend for any pup with the same skin issues!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bottle I’ve purchased for our dog. She suffers from itchy skin from allergies. It really seems to have helped that problem. I also noticed her fur is much softer. I know there are other great benefits with the omega 3 tablets so it’s a win, win. I will continue with these as part of her daily routine. The company is also great to deal with as an added bonus. They answered a question within minutes! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Poma

customer_reviews.title: Fast Acting and Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: My 15lb. 1yr. old parson russel terrier had incredibly dry skin when we first adopted him. On our first visit to the vet it was recommended to include some omega’s into his diet to help with the flaking/dog dandruff. I started to notice the difference in his coat within a week and now (two weeks in) no more dandruff! Yay! Needless to say I’m incredibly impressed by this product and would highly recommend it. For the first week we did 1 tablet per day and now we are at twice per day. Luckily our dog enjoys the taste and will eat it as a treat or thrown in his food bowl.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so grateful for these effective chews!
customer_reviews.text: I had done research that omega 3's could help with itchy skin. I am happy to report that my dachshund has significantly decreased in itching this past week! It took a good week or two of giving the chews once daily to have an effect but now she's much less itchy. I am so thankful and she seems much more comfortable! I will definitely continue to purchase your product for her. Thank you for making a great chew.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: My Dog LOVES It & It's Good for Her
customer_reviews.text: Everytime I shake this container, my 70lb European Dobey comes running and starts doing these crazy jumps and backflips. When I take out one treat, she starts spinning in circles and rolls over all at once, that I end up giving her four tablets instead. Okay, in all seriousness this is very good for your doggo. It seemed to help her with her stomach issues and it contains Omega-3, so you know it's GOOD. She seems happy, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: LETJC

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement
customer_reviews.text: My poor dog contracted Valley Fever. In addition to the pain in her joints, she developed flaky skin. The medication to treat Valley Fever can also cause dry skin and she will need to take that for a minimum of 6 months. So I ordered this product. She loves taking this supplement and eats it without having to hide it anything. Within a few weeks her dry skin cleared up. I will definitely keep using Amazing Omega with her.
customer_reviews.author: Elliespot

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the Omega supplement so far. I'm actually feeding it to all three of my dogs. Two are Australian Shepherds and their skin tends to be dry and itchy. I've used different supplements over the years that have worked but I was looking for a non oil supplement and this looked interesting. It seems to be working to help their skin so I hope the internal benefits are there as well. I haven't used it long enough to rate it a 5 star. Hopefully I can come back later and add a star.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor Nanc

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to help keep my dogs stay healthy!
customer_reviews.text: After losing my Golden retriever to cancer, I did research and decided to give my other Goldens the Omega 3. I just started them on the supplement, so I truly can't give an accurate review as to improvement. There is no horrible scent; too soon to notice any pain relief; one dog loves the chews and the other one gets his "disguised." I am happy to find something that will help fight off the horrible cancers,
customer_reviews.author: Judy Z.

customer_reviews.title: This really works for my dog's dry skin - very happy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over a year. My dog eats these tablets without hesitation and they do not have a horrible fishy smell. Her fur is gorgeous. It took several months, but she stopped scratching. This past winter she started scratching and I immediately doubled the dose for a month. She stopped scratching. I'm going to half the dose again for the spring/summer. Great product. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jean P

customer_reviews.title: Dog wouldn't eat
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a perventative measure to give to my 3 year old Border Collie who was just diagnosed with 'poor' hips. She's young yet so she hasn't started showing signs of any hip issues so I unfortuantely can't speak to the efficiacy of these. However, what I can speak to is the fact that my dog would NOT eat these. She absolutely refused to touch these and I ended up having to pound them into a powder to stick in her food. For that fact alone I can't really recommend them and wouldn't purchase them again. I need to find something that she will eat.
customer_reviews.author: Erica M. Ruyle

customer_reviews.title: Actually helped!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old German Shepherd recently began to show more extreme symptoms of DM. Her back legs were crossing and one foot was turning upside down as she was trying to walk. I immediately ordered these pills on the weekend that the symptoms started. She is now walking a lot better. She still has issues getting up, but she's moving around much better. I'm not sure if the pills helped or if she just re-trained herself how to walk with the condition. The more severe symptoms happened quickly (over night), but after taking the pills for a few days, she is doing much better.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Helped stop feet chewing!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Zoey is a Yellow Lab. We have had issues with her chewing on her feet for a very long time. I had tried several different supplements, ointments and bath products without success. About 2 weeks after we started putting the Omega 3 Chews in her food my husband noticed she wasn't chewing anymore. Her fur is also shinier. Will keep her on it from now on.
customer_reviews.author: W. Oshiro

customer_reviews.title: Like new
customer_reviews.text: My pit bull was suffering badly. He had a terrible skin condition that left him dry, dandruff and scratching to the point his skin was bleeding. His poor tail was bald and raw. I gave him 2 pills a day. Within 3 weeks he stopped itching and his bald spots filled in. His dandruff has almost cleared up. I also put coconut oil (microwaved) in his dry food. I am ordering this product again for sure. Way cheaper then a vet bill and allergy shots every month.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed234

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Pomeranian and my Spaniel mix dogs to help with shedding, skin health, and coat. In just 2 weeks of use, I have seen a HUGE reduction in shedding, and their fur is silky smooth and healthy looking. Plus, they must taste good to dogs and I don’t have to hide them in a pill pocket or wrap them in bread...my dogs seem to love the taste and think of them as a tasty daily treat! Super pleased to have something to help improve the health of my pups and also makes my life and housework easier with less shedding!
customer_reviews.author: McCoy1971

customer_reviews.title: My dogs tail fluff grew back!
customer_reviews.text: My dog thinks they are treats....even though they look like hard pills, I was surprised. I give them to her 2-3 times a day, in the morning and at night. Her fur wasnt very long even though she is a medium length dog and her siblings were fluffy, I was worried. She had dandruff and shed a lot, so we started her on these pills after looking around on amazon. In two weeks, I am proud to say her tail fluff is growing out!! And her fur is shiny and soft, and getting softer. Her fur is growing out and she doesnt itch as much. I highly recommend trying this product out before any expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy fish smell!
customer_reviews.text: My dog & I really hate the fishy smell! Can't believe it smells so strong. And the tablets were hard for my dog to chew. And my hands smelled. I have been buying 1-800PetMeds Omega 3 chews. My dog loves them! My vet commented on how healthy his coat looked. I only bought these because I was ordering subscribe and save items and felt it was more efficient to buy these too. WRONG!! If you hate the smell of fish do not buy these! Do not believe the label which says "no odor".
customer_reviews.author: mmr

customer_reviews.title: 2nd bottle - it works
customer_reviews.text: I have a Pomeranian and I like to keep his hair short in the summer. Well, as you may know cutting a double coat dog like a Pom causes issues when the hair grows back. I noticed those issues and started using this chewables and now his hair is growing in soft and shiny. Yes, you need to give 3 chewables a day, but this product works quickly when you use it correctly. Plus my dog LOVES these chewables - he thinks they are treats. It's priced right and worth it for your dog to have an amazing coat.
customer_reviews.author: PositiveGirl

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them and they work great!!
customer_reviews.text: We tried several Omega 3 options (oils, pills, etc) and our dog always stopped eating them after a few days. We were told that the any Omega 3 chewable wasn't strong enough by vets but decided to give these a try as a last resort and so glad we did!! Our dogs loves them and his itchy, dry skin has greatly improved! Definitely recommend these! For Reference, my dog is a 107 lb husky/lab mix and he takes 3/day (2 at breakfast and 1 at dinner)
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Hacker

customer_reviews.title: Not chew able.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this is not chew-able. It's crunch-able. It's pretty hard. Though, my dog eat everything and swallow before any chance of "chewing". How effective is hard to say. My dog recovered from herniated disc before the pills arrived so she just eating it as supplement/snack. I've read people's review about how great and effective the products. Look at my dog in this case, time can help heal them so many of them may just recovered as a result of rest and not the pills so I can't say how good the pills really are. Nonetheless, if it's healthy supplement, it should be ok anyway.
customer_reviews.author: MGL

customer_reviews.title: Great product - happy dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog really likes these Omega-3 chew tablets. She takes them like a treat. Her fur is shiny and healthy looking and she feels great. She will be 10 years old this year and I am glad I added these chews to keep her happy and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Dachsifan

customer_reviews.title: Not happy like we thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: First the smell would knock a human out! The longer you have it doesn't go away and my dogs didn't like the taste so they would spit them out. We tried to put it in their food also peanut butter.They would eat it sometimes after 3 weeks I gave up. It helped their dry skin and their coat got shiny some.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: My dog does not like it
customer_reviews.text: My dog is not crazy about this from the beginning. She always sniffs the tablet suspiciously and eat it the last after she finishes her other supplements that are soft chewable formats. Now she completely will not even eat it at all. This flavor and scent are most likely not what she likes. She is normally not fussy about treats either and will eat everything except vegetable.
customer_reviews.author: Just a customer

customer_reviews.title: Appreciate product and communication with company
customer_reviews.text: Appreciated the unsolicited follow-up communication directly from the company regarding the purchase of Omega 3 Chews supplements. Very much appreciate the “100% Natural” claim and hope that it is true. Not sure that I will ever give full daily amount (4 tabs per day to 2 dogs) due to the cost to do that; however, dogs do enjoy taking these tablets so these supplements make for a nice variety added to selection of “daily treats”.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write this review to make sure I had a good thing to write. I have been using it for 6 months and its now its on a subscription. My dogs scratching has become so minimal now, its amazing. Super healthy for your dog. I always heard to wait til your dog was 3 for supplements so that's what I did. I asked thevet before buying, she said it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not sure if it’s helped much
customer_reviews.text: i’m not sure if there has been any noticeable improvement or not. my dog has been taking the recommended dose for approximately a month and a half. at most, there is a slight improvement, but it’s very difficult to say for sure. and even less certain to say it’s a result of the omega-3. as a veterinary technician with about 10 yrs of experience, i’m fairly objective. does it hurt? no. is it helping? not sure.
customer_reviews.author: world traveler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought it after reading the reviews and it is great my dogs love it and i am able to see the results, their hair is shinny plus i noticed that they don't have hot spot as frequent as they used to do, not sure if it is because of the Omega but it is reduced and i love it :-) give it a try and best thing is to get two bottles as you can see the results after one month, that is when i noticed the big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Zeyad Deen

customer_reviews.title: Great for a softer coat
customer_reviews.text: Started giving our dog this product about a month ago. He not only loves these tablets, his coat is now much softer. He still sheds, but not as much. Recommend this product highly
customer_reviews.author: nursey

customer_reviews.title: I have been giving my senior boys Amazing Turmeric for two months and when I was at ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving my senior boys Amazing Turmeric for two months and when I was at the vet recently with my big guy, I told my doctor my big guy was generally doing better after I added the turmeric to the glucosoamine I was giving him. I asked if he could recommend any other supplements and he recommended Omega-3 because he said that would help with inflammation and overall health. So I came home and ordered them as soon as I could. He has been quite playful since we added the Omega-3 to his daily supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Anita M. Storey

customer_reviews.title: Been using for a month
customer_reviews.text: Maisy is doing well, her skin is much less flaky and dry. She has a form of alopecia that water dogs are subject to and her belly and the back of her legs are bald and were both very dry and both are looking much better. Her coat is also much softer. I will definitely keep giving her these supplements, she loves them and they are improving her skin and coat.
customer_reviews.author: JoEllen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My four year old lab mix has very a lot of problems with his back hip/legs. I use this combined with Dasuquin and Amazing Tumeric and it really works. If I wasn't using the three products listed here we would have had to put him down which I refuse to do. He gets around and does not seem to be in any pain. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ruscingno

customer_reviews.title: Good product - I just found that Welactin is considerably cheaper on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try these in place of the Nutramax fish oil tablets. My dog will willingly chomp down either. I just found the Nutramax Welactin 3 fish oil tablets to be considerably less expensive than these so I will switch back to them. Now, if you buy Welactin at the vet, this is the better buy. The vet charged me almost $12 more for Welactin than I could have purchased at Amazon. Lesson learned - don't buy supplements for your dog at the vet's office if you can avoid it.
customer_reviews.author: y2kdaddio

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: My Chihuahua (Jessie) just turned 13. I noticed that it has helped with her heart condition, her arthritis, and her coat is shiny. Jessie loves the flavor. Once in a while, she'll burp, and it'd smell like garlic LOL Her vet told me to keep doing what I'm doing. Great price, specially for small dogs. It lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Opened.
customer_reviews.text: Product was opened and obviously a return - someone had even written stuff on the bottle with a sharpie. There was not 120 tablets in this container either. I am in the process of the return. Very disappointed Updated: customer service was great and I was able to return it for a new one. My dogs loves these and things they are treats. I have noticed a difference in the softness of her fur but not with skin issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Helps my dog's skin
customer_reviews.text: Our dog came to my family with dry, flaky skin and an almost-bare spot above his tail. After 3 weeks with us, eating a healthy food and taking these supplements, he doesn't act itchy at all anymore, the fur has all grown back, and he only has a few flakes here and there. He loves the taste of these, too. Seems to be a good product!
customer_reviews.author: EditingCat

customer_reviews.title: He did love eating them too bad he couldn't keep them down
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in hope that it would help my puppy with his dry winter skin and shedding. I didn't get to use it for the full 4 weeks to see if it was effective for my dog. He does have a sensitive tummy so this could just be him , but after a couple days he kept throwing up after an hour after ingesting them. I thought it was just cause they were new but we kept with them for about 2 weeks with him throwing up. He did love eating them too bad he couldn't keep them down. I wouldn't recommend if you have a dog with a sensitive tummy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Balcacer

customer_reviews.title: This product has saved my dog’s skin!
customer_reviews.text: Lovebug has been doing very well since she started getting one of these chews per day. Her skin has cleared up dramatically, and she’s not constantly chewing or digging on herself. She seems to truly love the flavor of these, as she can’t wait to get it when I grab the bottle. I can’t thank you enough for having this product available for purchase. ­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­­
customer_reviews.author: Janet Lykins

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to fish oil soft-gels
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs did not care for the chewable fish oil tablets, but that is not the fault of the product. It appears to be a very good alternative to the soft gels we were using, and we thought we'd try it as an option instead of wrapping the soft gels in a pill pocket to get the dogs to take their fish oil. Unfortunately, after a couple of weeks they no longer wanted to eat these tablets, but again, not a fault of the product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fertenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 pound female Pomeranian. My husband and I drove 6 hours each way to pick her up from Arab Alabama. We were told she was a toy breed and would not weight more than 5 pounds. She has allergies and was constantly itching until we purchased this product. She has to take two due to her weight. We started out giving her one then increased it to two. She is definitely a lot happier and less itchy.
customer_reviews.author: TerriAnn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for joint issues
customer_reviews.text: My ten-year-old, 40-lb dog's joints were making cracking and popping sounds when she walked or ran. She'd been on Cosequin for a couple years but it wasn't helping anymore. I added about 6 of these tablets into her diet every day, and in several months, her joints are now quiet. Plus, she loves the taste, she thinks they're treats. I'm going to be a lifelong customer.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Omega combined with Chondroitin restored activity to our dog.
customer_reviews.text: We combine this product with Chondroitin. Our dog is 12 and was having a hard time walking very far. He now can walk 2-3 miles and has no problem walking around the rest of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Symanski

customer_reviews.title: No more dandruff
customer_reviews.text: My dogs all like the taste and think they’re getting treats. I got them originally for my chihuahua Molly who has always been plagued with horrific dandruff. At her checkup last month the vet recommended fish oil so I got the Amazing Omega and already she has virtually no dandruff....just a flake here and there. HUGE relief. I’m also giving Tucker and Teddy daily doses now, hoping especially to help with Tucker’s joint pain and lameness. So far so good. I just bought my second bottle of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2FiveDogs

customer_reviews.title: Fur is growing back!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product! We adopted our dog and he had some skin issues due to being a stray. We kept him on a good diet then started implementing these into his diet. Within a month his fur drastically changed and there were patchy spots that were growing in that were furless for 6 months! He won't eat it on its own but we just break the tablet up and place in his food in the morning and in the evening. He doesn't usually seem to notice the difference because it still has flavor. Overall, great product to give your dog!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Snider

customer_reviews.title: Stopped her scratching so much!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know if actually reduces pain because our dog started taking these for her skin. Her coat has gotten shinier and she no longer wakes us up with scratching in the middle of the night. She thinks they are treats and as soon as she is finished with breakfast she is at my feet waiting on her “treat”. We also give her a dental chew every morning so not sure about how her breath would be without that.
customer_reviews.author: paige

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Omega is AMAZING! and Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I have a two year old Newfie who had hip surgery at 6 mos old. She loves to run in the yard and fetch the ball, but would have a slight limp after about 7 tosses of tge ball. Needless to say, after a month on Amazing Omega, shes only gets hot after a dozen or so tosses. No limping that I can see!
customer_reviews.author: jaols

customer_reviews.title: My dog did not like them
customer_reviews.text: First, I want to say I like the company that sell this product. I like how they wanted to make sure my dog was showing results. My issue is my Great Pyrenees would sniff it and not eat it. I put it in her moth and she spit it out. I was not able to see if the product worked or not. I suggest they make them with a better flavor and a little chewy so maybe she will eat it. Other then that I think the company is really good.
customer_reviews.author: peewee

customer_reviews.title: The customer interaction is wonderful. I received a couple of emails checking to ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves these. And I really have noticed a difference. She is not scratching and biting and her coat looks health. The customer interaction is wonderful. I received a couple of emails checking to make sure I received the item and that all was going well. I am getting ready to order another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Kloppenburg

customer_reviews.title: 5 days in and so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old lhasapoo has been itchy/licky for a while and a little less spunky. She has a minor luxating patella that she takes glucosamine for. I decided to give these a try since she's been a little lazier than normal due to the cold weather (and I'm sure me being pregnant doesn't help her laziness). She's been taking them for 5 days and she's already less licky/itchy and more spunky. Lazy when she needs to be but acting more like her younger self.
customer_reviews.author: Casjean

customer_reviews.title: Good Results!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my 9 year old pit bull mix dog because my vet recommended an Omega supplement. I had tried others; however, my dog did not like any of them. This one he likes! I put the tablets in his food each night and he leaves some food for the morning but never the supplement tablets. He is doing better! He was having a hard time walking and running. I think he may have other issues; however, after talking with the vet, Omega is a MUST for all dogs especially those who are getting older. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W.

customer_reviews.title: Very thankful for these
customer_reviews.text: I was giving my dog (8 year old, 100 lb. English lab) glucosamine with chondroitin and only noticed a small difference when he would stand up from laying. The vet recommended this so I gave it a shot....he's standing up better than he has in a long time and is jumping back on my bed! Thrilled!! Plus he loves them! Update: why is this no longer available? I had to order a new brand and my dog doesnt like them! I'm bummed!
customer_reviews.author: anglee6

customer_reviews.title: plus they like them! It's like a treat to them
customer_reviews.text: Now that my dogs have been getting these tabs for a few weeks, I can definitely see a difference in their coats. My golden retriever mix is not shedding as much and my maltipoo & shih zhu have thicker/softer coats. The little doggies get 1 tab/day and I give the larger dog 2 tabs/day. I'll continue giving them the tabs...plus they like them! It's like a treat to them. I've just placed another order.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Amazing how FAST it works
customer_reviews.text: My dog's coat was dry and coarse and I couldn't seem to find a product that they liked and worked. I tried this Omega for Dogs product and the result was incredible. Overnight (in less than 24 hours) their hair became significantly softer and smoother. I have been using it for almost a month and their hair is not matting anymore either. This is a great product that works!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: SO much better than the liquid ones
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome find for me. Was having trouble with the liquid omega getting everywhere and going bad too soon if not refrigerated. My dogs love them and think they are treats, not to mention it helps their joints and mobility as they are getting up there in years.
customer_reviews.author: CarolynB

customer_reviews.title: Great For Full And Healthy Coat
customer_reviews.text: I received the first order of Omega 3 Chews about two months ago. My dog is a 12-pound schnauzer/terrier mix. Since taking the pills she has not been scratching herself and coat has become very thick and healthy looking. I have ordered more bottles for my dog and for friends.
customer_reviews.author: El Diablo

customer_reviews.title: Great product but . . .
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy the chews but decided to try the tablets. My dog does not like the tablets. I am using a pill crusher and bone broth to get my dog to take this product. The chews are awesome! I am going to switch back to the chews once this product is finished.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C

customer_reviews.title: I'm actually quite impressed. His hair is growing back ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually quite impressed. His hair is growing back very black and shiney. Although he still scratches his flanks and back legs some, it is much, much less. I don't see much flaking anymore and he's only been taking it 3 weeks. Already have my second bottle scheduled for delivery later.
customer_reviews.author: workshopper

customer_reviews.title: Consistency
customer_reviews.text: Consistency is so important with animals as are kids!! We (or I) treat my dogs like I have 3 kids ( i only have 1), So their health is very important and live a long happy life so vitamins are important to dogs as are humans and they love, love, love the bacon flavored ones, i just mix it with their food and they just eat it, No Complaints here just a happy customer and 3 pups !!
customer_reviews.author: christal armbruster

customer_reviews.title: I love them. I did have to take them out ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boxer mix. I love them. I did have to take them out of the bottle. If they're in the bottle he thinks it's medicine and won't eat them. If they're in a baggie he thinks they're treats and eats them right up! These pills are making his hair SO soft and shiny! He's shedding a lot less too. His skin tends to be dry causing him to scratch quite a bit with visible flakes and he's scratching less and I'm not seeing the flakes anymore. Due to his size the bottle recommends 3-4 tablets a day but I typically do 2 and that seems to be perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I do like the tablet form as opposed to the chews I had been using. My dog seems to like the tablets just as much. Since she was already on an Omega 3 supplement, her condition has remained the same (which is a good thing, it means their tablets are good quality and digestible for her). The container also takes up less space on the counter ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Christina Kollar

customer_reviews.title: SHE EATS IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I JUST received these last week, so I'm not going to lie and say her coat has improved or her health has changed. HOWEVER, this is the FIRST pill she will eat without me trying to disguise it!! At least we have a chance to see if her coat improves or her health changes because SHE WILL EAT IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer DB

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes them and the vet recommended fish oil because of his kidney disease, but in order to take the vet's recommended dose, he would have eat a huge pile every day. Now I just give him a 1000mg Vit E capsule hidden in a marshmallow each day--much less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: DJR

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs think they are treats!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs absolutely LOVE their Omega 3 chews!!! Theyvthink they are getting yummy treats! I just have to say "It's vitamin time!!!" And both come running to me! Their coats are incredibly glossy and soft. When we take them out for walks or to the dog park, people stop us and ask if they had just had baths! I have purchased them as a subscription and I am very happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product and he likes the taste
customer_reviews.text: This product made my 3 year old Golden Retriever stop shedding as much and his hair become sooooooo much softer! My wife and I both noticed the change in about 3 days. Great product and he likes the taste. I think I should try it also!
customer_reviews.author: obx Al

customer_reviews.title: More bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: My children at first were iffy about the omega 3 chews but eventually, they look forward to eating it! As a matter of fact, I put the omega-3 chews in their bowl of food and they end up eating only that and not touch their food. Overall, they love it, I love it! I'm glad I went with this purchase and I would recommend it to other pet owners. It's good for dogs and has nutrional value for them and it's a good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are easy to get your dog to eat
customer_reviews.text: After my dog finished the first container, I held off on buying another. Since going off, his skin is definitely more dry and prone to hot spots! He is. Golden Retriever, so dry skin is very common and can mean flakes, irritation, etc. These are easy to get your dog to eat, don't smell, and make a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Turner

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for MY dog
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this didn’t work for my dog, it only made the itching, dandruff and overall coat worse. He also got a hot spot for the first time while using this product. We used this for almost a month before switching back to a liquid, easy to use fish oil. It’s been less than a week of switching back, and we’ve already seen a significant improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Our Dog Had a Reaction
customer_reviews.text: First of all our dog didn't want to eat these. We finally wrapped it I cheese and she got it down. 2 hours later she threw up this clear yellow fluid, which she's never done before. I sent a message to the seller but didn't hear back.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce B

product_meta.title: Amazing Omega for Dogs - Dog Fish Oil Pet Antioxidant for Shiny Coat, Joint and Brain Health - 120 Chews
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:LiverGet the Only Complete Omega 3-6-9 Fish Oil Chewable Tablet That DOGS LOVE TO EAT! 

 

Omega 3 Chews for Dogs by Amazing Nutritionals is the only great-tasting dog supplement that treats coat and skin conditions, itchy skin, flaking, and hot spots while protecting your dog's heart, immune system, and joints. 

It's a powerful way to achieve total dog health... and it's the only one on the market! Get optimum skin and coat health and increased joint mobility, both of which are important as your dog ages. 

PLUS... your dog will absolutely LOVE these tasty bacon and liver flavored chewable tablets

Achieves Total Dog Health 

 

- Restores your dog's natural balance with a complete Omega 3-6-9

Achieves Optimal Heart, Immune System, and Hip and Joint Support 

- Safe and proven for a shiny coat and health skin PLUS
Targets arthritis for joint pain relief
Healthy hips and joints for increased hip and joint mobility
Helps reduce inflammation and discomfort 

 

And Best of All... 

- Veterinarian Recommended, Totally Safe as a Daily Supplement - Contains No Fish, Shrimp, Crab, Shark, or Avocado - Won't Hurt Your Pet
Made in the USA, GMP Organic Certified Facility and 3rd Party Tested for Purity
No Refrigeration Required
Bacon and Liver Flavored Chewable Tablets Your Pet Will Love 

MONEY-BACK 30-DAY GUARANTEE - MASSIVE IMPROVEMENT in your dog's condition within 30 days or a COMPLETE REFUND! 

Don't Wait... Click the Button at the Top of This Page to Help Your Dog Feel Better Now!

Promotes a shiny coat, healthy bones, joints and brain health in a tasty chewable tablet your dog will love

Guaranteed results, or your money back
